channel.title: Hey, I got a great idea
channel.description:
hey, I was thinking that MoparScape is starting to get boring... so I came up with some ideas as what we as a comunity and the Mods can do.
[ul][li]Add more boards - Boards like, Spam, Forum games ect... for useless things that people otherwise would minus reputation points, flame so on. [/li] [li]Change the colors and the Forum layout a bit - Well the current forums have been used for ages, maybe it's time to get a new layout, template or even new forums.[/li] [li]Hold more competitions - It would rise people's self esteem for a starters [/li][/ul]
Well personaly I think theese might bring some "Freshness" into MoparScape, tell me your opinion?

item.title: Hey, I got a great idea
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

There is at least 1 more desktop theme that you can choose to use if you wish. And if many people want another theme installed, I’ll do it. I’ll never add a ‘spam’ board though, tried it once with horrible results.

If you want more competitions, suggest away!

Read full topic
item.source: Hey, I got a great idea

item.title: Hey, I got a great idea
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

This is MoparScape, the way it is is part of it’s identify.
And it’s barely changed over at all over the last 4 years.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey, I got a great idea
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

There isn’t really a need for more boards unless you can name important ones. Also you might want to suggest a nice theme etc, iirc Moparisthebest will have a theme if a majority suggests it. I do agree with you about the competitions part. So far only the models board had competitions.

Read full topic
